QuestData.Title: The Gates of Grim Batol
QuestData.Description: Kroggs started the assault to push up the canyon. He's just past the gate to our southeast.$B$BI'm going to get the squad together to join the attack. We'll meet you down there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Warlord Krogg in Wyrms' Bend.
QuestData.RewardText: The canyon is well fortified, but the distraction that the dragons are providing should be enough to allow us to break through.
